body: Hey guys, I am NOT new here, I used to use my cousins account (kyleskill) most of you probably know me as that but do not think that it is me because I have my own account now (hence the name) and im wondering if there is any way to transfer my stats?
body_tagged: Hey guys, I am NOT new here, I used to use my cousins account (kyleskill) most of you probably know me as that but do not think that it is me because I have my own account now (hence the name) and im wondering if there is any way to transfer my stats?
title: My name is Twiistify! Used to be Kyleskill

replies.body:
Hey hey! (: 

Welcome again! If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to ask any Staff Member, as we will help you! :)

As, for you stats question, nope. Stats cannot be transferred to new accounts D:

However, if you had a rank from your old account (that you purchased) ,Sr. Staff+ can transfer the rank to your new account ^,^
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Also, when will staff apps be open again? Because I applied before I left but never got an awnser.
replies.body_tagged: Also, when will staff apps be open again? Because I applied before I left but never got an awnser.

replies.body:
Staff Applications are estimated to be opened at the end of the month, or in September :D

Make sure you're active on the forums, so you can see when they open ;D
